It's exhilarating custom design uses sophisticated style, high end finishes and generous yet cleverly zoned spaces to provide the best in executive family living and entertaining. It is the perfect opportunity for those who want a near-new boutique home that offers premium quality, an exquisite attention to detail this exceeds all expectations with its innovation & modernist style.
Architecturally designed with grand proportions over two floors, downstairs is appointed with a stunning open-plan domain featuring a culinary kitchen complete with lavish Caesar-stone finishing the waterfall island bench, Asko and Electrolux appliances & a huge butler's pantry that enjoys the same exacting standards.
A versatile home theatre or formal lounge upon entrance, separate laundry room & powder room adds peerless appeal. Upstairs features four generously proportioned bedrooms including the master retreat which has a walk-in robe and luxe double vanity ensuite boasting stone benchtops. Upstairs further features a full family bathroom with luxury fittings including a freestanding stone bath as well as an open family retreat/rumpus with a private balcony for fabulous living versatility.
Contemporary touches include a remote garage, zoned refrigerated heating/cooling, quality floating floorboards, custom window furnishings, fully wired home theatre, plantations and designer light fittings.
This luxe home also offers a seamless indoor/outdoor design with built in outdoor seating area, decking, continuous vertical gardens & a privileged Circa lifestyle close to elite schools, childcare, Berwick Waters lake, local park, shops & transport.
